body.p: Complementary and Alternative Medicine in Pakistan: Prospects and Limitations
Babar T. Shaikh and Juanita Hatcher
The author would like to apologize for the omission of the third author of this Review. Authorship should read:
Babar T. Shaikh1, Juanita Hatcher2 and Suleman Qazi1
1Health Systems Division and 2Community Health Sciences Research Development Office, Department of Community Health Sciences, Aga Khan University, Karachi, Pakistan
